description: This file is the main entry point for a Flutter-based Notes application. It initializes the app by setting up a Provider for state management and applies a custom theme, then launches the main notes list screen.

classes.name: NotesApp
classes.description: Root widget of the Notes application that sets up theme and state management.

methods.name: main
methods.description: Application entry point that initializes and runs the NotesApp widget.

methods.name: build
methods.description: Build method for the NotesApp widget that constructs the widget tree, including theme and state provider setup.
